xwikidoc.title: Griffin Hold
xwikidoc.content: A castle hidden in the vast forests of southern Farlond. It was once held by the [[Order of the Griffin>>doc:OrderofTheGriffin]], but is now the lair of the green dragon Om-Vertithrax. Since the dragon's demise less than a year ago, the castle has remained largely empty. A few of his green kobolds remain there, but they have little power.
